name: Unborn Minichild
description:
Wanka has to jump on plataforms, avoid enemies, collect coins and keep her mind sane and keep up the determination to go further in this strange adventure!

CONTROLS:

ARROW KEYS and SPACE

Hello you, my name is Vinny, and this is my first game ever, i started this project last year around september and with no programming knowledge what so ever, but i was determined to finish it just to prove to myself that i CAN do something and finish something if i really want to. i've gotta say, that was one of a jurney, i really pushed my self to the limit on this. And there you all have it, i really hope at least a good amout of people play this and coment what you all though of my game. Have a good day and goodbye!

PS: i used GM1.4 so it has some limitations, the main is that i couldn't add more sounds to the project, if i tried so the game wouldn't open, so i had to overwrite some existing sound files and use them for the purpose that i was planing, so the game lacks on soundtracks, but it has background sounds and everything. I tried i really tried but it just wouldn't work, sorry about that :,)
